covid_news_handling module¶

Description:

gets news articles from an api and then creates a list of dictionaries contatining the title, content and link to each of those articles

covid_news_handling.call_articles() → list¶

Description:

passes list of news articles into flask module

Arguments:

None

Returns:

articles {list}list of dictinaries containitng articles with sub ditionaries:

{title} {content}
